ygData.subject: Re: Will the Bard get better....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hm, I m around the same level as you, and do -not- have the problem. Personally, I ditched the Mino Axe I wielded around level 7 or so.  I realized that my
ygData.messageBody:
Hm, I'm around the same level as you, and do -not- have the problem.
Personally, I ditched the Mino Axe I wielded around level 7 or so. I
realized that my chief strength should be speed, take most advantage of my
buffing songs that way.

Consider this: Recently a troll and I were good naturedly beating on the
same monster... he with some gigantic sword that seemed to be doing a
massive amount of damage, and me with a fine steel spear. He bashed, I
bellowed. And when all was said and done I got the loot. The troll was
quite upset, stared down at the little man with the toothpick, couldn't
understand how I had bested him--especially when I conned "blue" to him. Do
not underestimate a fast weapon.

There's formulas about this people have posted here, I honestly think your
problem is that damn axe.

I know I should upgrade to a combine weapon, haven't gotten around to it
yet. And you know, almost tempted to grab a rapier... can't decide if I
should. Have a feeling the rapier might not be such a great "main" weapon,
yet I'm certain I'll use a rapier when I dual wield. (Part of my attraction
is that they look so damn cool, and I never see anyone using them.) For now
I use my spear, which has a fine damage/speed advantage. I may simply buy a
combine sword now (to keep my other skill up), and the rapier later.

Roop
-----Original Message-----
From: Lynn Uhlman <uhlmar@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 28, 1999 6:38 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Will the Bard get better....


Hello fellow Bards,

Man i envy you bards that are in the high 20's and 30's, how did u ever
get that high? I seem to be stuck at lvl 15. My question is focused at u
higher lvl bards. The question is does the bard get better? Don't get me
wrong i love my lvl 15 bard but when i comes to dishing out damage in a
battle i am weak. I know the bard class is not designed to be a warrior,
but for example, i bought a mino axe at lvl 9, i still dishes the same
amount of damage now at lvl 15 as it did at lvl 9 except for the below song
and it only does 8 damage. I would like to solo eventually but i'm afraid
because i have a hard time with creatures that con blue to me. You high lvl
players, is the bard worth the wait? Will we eventually do more damage and
be able to hold our own? I love the bard class but i also like to know i am
a valuable addition to any group. Higher in lvl's groups are looking for
wizards, tanks, and healers where do we fit in? Just a little frustrated i
guess from dying 3 times in Unrest yesterday...

U higher lvl players post a message with your secrets to success... I
need it..hehe.


Thanks,

Humility....innorruk
